text: Antonina Girycz (20 February 1939 – 19 January 2022) was a Polish actress. She appeared in more than 50 movies and television shows. Her career began in 1966. Girycz was known for her roles in Katastrofa (1965) and A Woman's Decision (1975). She was born in Berdyczów, Poland. Girycz died on 19 January 2022 at the age of 82.Warszawa.
